answers.answer: I had the same symptoms and went to the ER twice n they told me yeast infection but I know it wasn't that, wen I finally went to see my gyno she said my blood sugar was so high, I was diagnosed with diabetes and that was the reason. Check your blood sugar....

question: In the past few days my anus and vagina have become unbearably itchy.  I have a very healthy diet, take suppliments, am not sexually active. The only thing I have done differently is increase vit C to 2000mg/day(which I have now stopped) and have also bveen having vitB injections weekly. any suggestions?
title: itchy anus/vagina
